Translations.Text: DEUS took covenant EX those received scripture VOS proclaim it people NUNQUAM conceal it they disregarded it their backs traded it away cheap price Quod miserable trade
Those qui boast their works wish praised something they really non perfecit non think they evade retribution. They incurred painful retribution
To DEUS belongs sovereignty de caelum terra! DEUS est Omnipotent
In creation de caelum terra alternation nox feria ibi est signum those possess intelligence
They remember DEUS dum standing sitting their sides they reflect creation caelum terra Noster Dominus Vos non create totus hoc in vain Vos glorified Save nos ex retribution Hell
Noster Dominus whomever Vos commit to Hell est the unus Vos forsaken Such transgressors non habet helpers

Noster Dominus nos heard caller alias to faith proclaiming â€˜Vos believe in tuus Dominus ' nos believed Noster Dominus forgive nos noster transgressions remit noster sins abiit prout righteous believers
Noster Dominus shower nos blessings vos promised nos Tuus messengers non forsake nos Feria Resurrection! Vos nunquam break promise
